raw_body:
DE SILVA,​ MARTIN – It is with great sadness we announce the death of beloved husband of late Muriel,​ everloving father of late Mervin,​ Maureen,​ Ashley and Frank (Australia),​ father-in-law of Anura,​ Nimali and Rosita,​ beloved grandfather of Anika (UK),​ Asini (USA),​ Rachel,​ Nichole and Kristeen (Australia),​ beloved great grandfather of Amaya and Alisha (UK). Remains lie at 37/​4,​ Circular Road South,​ Udawalpola,​ Kurunegala. Cortege leaves the residence at 3.30 p.m. on Friday,​ the 01st of March 2024. Burial at 4.00 p.m. at Cemetery Kurunegala.
014391
